channel.title: Making barrage work
channel.description:
ok, so ive got my barrage code added in.. it's doing the barrage emote and it's hitting the damage..
but NOT freezing the other player or making the ice box around them
please help? thx.. :D
could someone give me another code or help me fix it?

item.title: Making barrage work
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Depends what kinda source you have.

If your source is based around…

if (spellID == 12891) {
//Barrage Crap
}

Or something close, then your in luck.

Below the GFX, where it shows the GFX on the player. Add this.

castOnPlayer.entangle();

If you dont have that void. Add this.

public void entangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 60;
}

Then add this int.

public int EntangleDelay = 0;

Hav a nise day

Read full topic
